#summary Getting started
= Getting Started =

This getting started guide gives an overview setting up gwt-java-math. If you have any questions, thoughts, or ideas send them to the [http://groups.google.com/group/gwt-java-math discussion group].

  # Download the gwt-java-math.jar and add it to your class path.
  # Include the following GWT module dependency in your project:

{{{
<inherits name="net.zschech.gwt.math.Math" />
}}}
